main event: A bright red object appeared on the horizon and descended to the sea for approximately 2 hours and 5 minutes before disappearing behind a cloud formation.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on November 4, 1959, at 0412 GMT., The object was reported to have been a bright red color., A Jupiter missile was fired on the same evening, suggesting a possible explanation for the sighting., The object was tracked as it ascended to an altitude of 24 degrees true., Witnesses included personnel observing from different locations.
